data.title: Things to Do in K1 Speed Irvine - K1 Speed
data.meta_description: Looking for fun things to do in K1 Speed Irvine? This webpage covers everything you can enjoy inside our Orange County center.
data.text:
The main thing to do in K1 Speed Irvine is our world-famous indoor go-kart racing experience! Our Adult Karts are for teens and adults 58″ (4’10”) or taller can speed up to 45 miles per hour – the fastest in the industry! And kids who are 48″ (4′) or taller can drive our Junior Karts which can approach speeds of 20 miles per hour!

Plus, our go karts and tracks are the safest in the industry, and they’re all-electric. This means no noxious exhaust fumes to breathe in, and your guests won’t reek of a gas station when they leave.

Maybe some of your guests are more of the timid type, and don’t dream of becoming the next Formula One champion. Well, they can still have plenty of laughs and fun too. Our gaming area is stocked with something for everyone. We’ve got co-op games, pinball, hoops, prize machines, air hockey and more!

After all the fun things you’re going to be doing inside K1 Speed Irvine, you’re going to want to recharge your batteries. So make a pit stop at the Paddock Lounge! This café’s got tons of great food options like pizza, wings, burgers, nachos and more! Plus, we’ve got a full selection of soft drinks, Red Bull Energy Drinks, plus beer and wine!

Browse our menu below to see everything we’ve got!
